name: Massacre at High Castle
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Left mouse - Attack

Right mouse - Possess

Space - Dash

F - Aim with musket

Escape - Menu

F12 - Reset current level

LORE

You lost. For hundred of years, you waited. Angry. Very angry. The King and their knights took your domain, but soon you will get your revenge. As a servant was summoning you from the demonic plane, your soul slowly possessing his body, you feel your rage exploding. 

They will pay with their BLOOD, as JUSTICE will be finally DEALT! An ORGY of BLOOD await these PUNY HUMANS as an END to their MISERABLE existence. Their BODIES will be YOURS, and you will USE them to KILL THEM ALL!

THE GAME

Massacre at High Castle is a fast paced, chaotic action game. Possess your enemies to gain their strengths and use it to your advantage. As you rampage through the castle, destroy your environment and kill enemies to unlock your power. Dance around enemies by dashing and unleash combos to annihilate your foes.

CREDITS

Aalto University
Game Designer - Ken Oshiro

KAMK
Producer - Jouni Luokkanen

Lead Programmer - Sami Turpeinen
Programmer - Eemeli Koivisto
Programmer - Daniil Smirnov
Programmer - Niilo Karjalainen

Lead Artist - Avery Rantanen
3D Artist - Jesse Kukkohovi
3D Artist - Ella Rissanen

Cutscene narration by Otto "Hunts" Kemppainen

Musket sounds by aaronsiler, https://freesound.org/people/aaronsiler/, unmodified.
Licensed under CC BY 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/,

Music by RussianGolden

Play the game on HIGH FIDELITY for maximum performance.
